mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(),'-','') from dual
INSERT INTO teaching (id, teacher_id, course_id, semester, state, week, time_arrange) VALUES (#{id}, #{teacherId}, #{courseId},#{semester}, #{state}, #{week}, #{timeArrange})
mapper.update: UPDATE teaching SET teacher_id = #{teacherId}, course_id = #{courseId}, semester = #{semester}, state = #{state}, week = #{week}, time_arrange = #{timeArrange} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT teaching.*, teacher.id tid, teacher.name tname, teacher.sex, teacher.number tnumber, course.id cid, course.name cname, course.classhour, course.number cnumber FROM teaching LEFT OUTER JOIN teacher ON teaching.teacher_id = teacher.id LEFT OUTER JOIN course ON teaching.course_id = course.id ORDER BY (course.name + 0) ASC

SELECT teaching.*, teacher.id tid, teacher.name tname, teacher.sex, teacher.number tnumber, course.id cid, course.name cname, course.classhour, course.number cnumber FROM teaching LEFT OUTER JOIN teacher ON teaching.teacher_id = teacher.id LEFT OUTER JOIN course ON teaching.course_id = course.id WHERE teaching.teacher_id = #{teacherId} ORDER BY (course.name + 0) ASC

SELECT teaching.*, teacher.id tid, teacher.name tname, teacher.sex, teacher.number tnumber, course.id cid, course.name cname, course.classhour, course.number cnumber, field.id fid, field.name fname FROM teaching LEFT OUTER JOIN teacher ON teaching.teacher_id = teacher.id LEFT OUTER JOIN course ON teaching.course_id = course.id LEFT OUTER JOIN field ON teaching.field_id = field.id WHERE teaching.week = #{week} AND teaching.state = 1 ORDER BY (course.name + 0) ASC
